synopsis.text:
After a heated altercation over a lunchtime seat, high school sophomore and academic whiz, Futaro Uesugi, crosses paths with Itsuki Nakano, a feisty transfer student. Little does he know, this chance encounter will change the course of his life. When a lucrative tutoring opportunity arises, Futaro jumps at the chance to alleviate his family's financial woes. To his dismay, he discovers that his new pupils are none other than Itsuki and her four equally stunning, yet academically challenged sisters - all quintuplets!

As the Nakano sisters teeter on the brink of academic failure, Futaro's mission to win their trust and transform their disdain for studying becomes his top priority. Navigating the chaotic world of these five strong-willed young women proves to be a daily challenge, but Futaro remains steadfast in his commitment to guide them towards graduation.

With stakes high and emotions running wild, Futaro's life takes a dramatic turn as he embarks on a tumultuous, yet endearing journey with the Nakano quintuplets in this heartwarming and hilarious romantic comedy.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
